sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer

Class TransactionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer.TransactionController

  • public class TransactionController
extends java.lang.Object
    This control object coordinates the customer transactions for selection of a drink brand, coin input, storage of coins and termination requests for ongoing transactions.
    Version:
    1.0 2008-10-01
    Author:
    Team SE16T5E

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TransactionController(MainController mainCtrl)
      This constructor creates an instance of the TransactionController.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancelTransaction()
      This method will cancel an ongoing customer transaction.
      void closeDown()
      This method will close down the transaction control function of the vending machine.
      void completeTransaction()
      This method is performed when the Transaction Controller is informed that coin entry is complete and the money received is sufficient to dispense the drink.
      void displayCustomerPanel()
      This method displays and initialize the CustomerPanel.
      ChangeGiver getChangeGiver()
      This method returns the ChangeGiver.
      CoinReceiver getCoinReceiver()
      This method returns the CoinReceiver.
      CustomerPanel getCustomerPanel()
      This method returns the CustomerPanel.
      DispenseController getDispenseController()
      This method returns the DispenseController.
      MainController getMainController()
      This method returns the MainController.
      int getPrice()
      This method returns the price of the selected drink.
      int getSelection()
      This method returns the selected drink index.
      boolean isChangeGiven()
      This method returns whether the change is given.
      boolean isDrinkDispensed()
      This method returns whether the drink is dispensed.
      void nullifyCustomerPanel()
      This method will nullify reference to customer panel.
      void processMoneyReceived(int total)
      This method processes the money received by the Coin Receiver during the progress of a transaction. The following actions are performed during this method:
      1- The current total money inserted is obtained from the Coin Receiver.
      2- If the received money is more than or equal to the price of the drink, method CompleteTransaction of the Transaction Controller is triggered.
      3- If the received money is less than the price of the drink, the Coin Receiver is instructed to continue receiving the coin.
      void refreshCustomerPanel()
      This method refreshes the CustomerPanel when maintainer logs-out.
      void refreshMachineryDisplay()
      This method refreshes the MachinerySimulatorPanel.
      void setChangeGiven(boolean changeGiven)
      This method sets whether the change is given.
      void setDrinkDispensed(boolean drinkDispensed)
      This method sets whether the drink is dispensed.
      void setPrice(int price)
      This method sets the price of the selected drink.
      void setSelection(int selection)
      This method sets the selected drink index.
      void startTransaction(int drinkIdentifier)
      This method will start the customer transaction. It receives the identification for the selected drink brand (item) from the Customer Panel. The following actions are performed in the method:
      1- The price of the selected item is obtained.
      2- The Refund/ Change Tray Display is reset.
      3- The Can Collection Box is reset.
      4- The Drink Selection Box is deactivated to disallow the selection of further drinks when the transaction is in progress.
      5- The Coin Receiver will be instructed to start receiving the coins.
      void terminateFault()
      If the TransactionController is informed that a fault was discovered while dispensing a drink, giving change or storing Coins, it will use this method to deactivate the Drink Selection Box and instruct the CoinReceiver to refund the money inserted by the customer.
      void terminateTransaction()
      If the TransactionController receivers a request to terminate the current transaction then following will occur:
      1- If there is no transaction in progress or coin input is completed then the CustomerPanel will be instructed to deactivate the DrinkSelectionBox.
      2- If coin input is not yet complete, the CoinReceiver will be instructed to stop coin input and refund the money entered so far.
      3- The DrinkSelectionBox is then reset to allow further transactions.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public TransactionController(MainController mainCtrl)

    • Method Detail

      • getMainController

        public MainController getMainController()
        This method returns the MainController.
        Returns:
        the MainController.

      • displayCustomerPanel

        public void displayCustomerPanel()
        This method displays and initialize the CustomerPanel.

      • startTransaction

        public void startTransaction(int drinkIdentifier)
        This method will start the customer transaction. It receives the identification for the selected drink brand (item) from the Customer Panel. The following actions are performed in the method:
        1- The price of the selected item is obtained.
        2- The Refund/ Change Tray Display is reset.
        3- The Can Collection Box is reset.
        4- The Drink Selection Box is deactivated to disallow the selection of further drinks when the transaction is in progress.
        5- The Coin Receiver will be instructed to start receiving the coins.
        Parameters:
        drinkIdentifier - the drink brand item identifier.

      • processMoneyReceived

        public void processMoneyReceived(int total)
        This method processes the money received by the Coin Receiver during the progress of a transaction. The following actions are performed during this method:
        1- The current total money inserted is obtained from the Coin Receiver.
        2- If the received money is more than or equal to the price of the drink, method CompleteTransaction of the Transaction Controller is triggered.
        3- If the received money is less than the price of the drink, the Coin Receiver is instructed to continue receiving the coin.
        Parameters:
        total - the total money received.

      • completeTransaction

        public void completeTransaction()
        This method is performed when the Transaction Controller is informed that coin entry is complete and the money received is sufficient to dispense the drink. The following actions are performed.
        1- Dispense the drink.
        2- Give change if necessary.
        3- Store the Coins that have been entered into the Cash Store.
        4- Reset the Drink Selection Box to allow further transactions.

      • terminateFault

        public void terminateFault()
        If the TransactionController is informed that a fault was discovered while dispensing a drink, giving change or storing Coins, it will use this method to deactivate the Drink Selection Box and instruct the CoinReceiver to refund the money inserted by the customer.

      • terminateTransaction

        public void terminateTransaction()
        If the TransactionController receivers a request to terminate the current transaction then following will occur:
        1- If there is no transaction in progress or coin input is completed then the CustomerPanel will be instructed to deactivate the DrinkSelectionBox.
        2- If coin input is not yet complete, the CoinReceiver will be instructed to stop coin input and refund the money entered so far.
        3- The DrinkSelectionBox is then reset to allow further transactions.

      • cancelTransaction

        public void cancelTransaction()
        This method will cancel an ongoing customer transaction.

      • refreshCustomerPanel

        public void refreshCustomerPanel()
        This method refreshes the CustomerPanel when maintainer logs-out.

      • closeDown

        public void closeDown()
        This method will close down the transaction control function of the vending machine.

      • setChangeGiven

        This method sets whether the change is given.
        Parameters:
        changeGiven - TRUE the change is given, otherwise FALSE.

        This method returns whether the change is given.
